title: hELP
body: i HAVE A PROBLEM, I start to play again LoL but all my interface isn't here, i can't choose skill or see my spells, fps and other, only the chat, what can i do?

replies.body: i think is a problem with your video device, please update your driver and check with repair tool, i mean lol repair tool
Reinstall lol ,do a repair ,contact the support
